document_data.mainbody:
ancha was a penpal of a noblewoman from Daggerford, Alicine Bricket in the 14 century DR.
Even though Sancha lived in a town of Bowshot on the Sword Coast, she had been exchanging letters with Alicine Bricket for the majority of their lives since childhood. In 1372 DR, Sancha was expected to visit her old friend in the Bricket Homestead to the west of Daggerford. She was invited to a celebration of Alicines and Muriel Brickets much hated brother, Elveronne Bricket.
